00040 class CompFluid : public Fluid {

00042         CompFluid(FileIO &fio, int mThermal_in);

00044 
00045         // --- set initial Zc from the Zc vs. depth table ----
00046         virtual void setInitZ(double depth, double *zz) { }
00047         virtual void setPVTInitZ(double pres, double *Sat, double *zz, double mRg) { }
00048 
00049         //stability test computation for a given P, T and Zi 
00050         //return the value of tangent plane distance (TDP);
00051         virtual double stability(double pres, double temp, const double *zi, PhaseType phaseType)=0;
00052         virtual double explicitStability(double pres, double temp, const double *zi, const double *ki,PhaseType phaseType)=0;

00066         HCPhase* getHCPhase(int index) { return mHCPhases[index]; }

00070         virtual std::string getExpDataFile() const=0;

00075

00078         double getXi(int i) const { return x[i]; }

00083         virtual double getLiquidVolumeFraction()=0;

00086         double getStdMolDen(int i) const {return StdMolDen[i];}
00087         double getMassDen(int ip) const { return denp[ip]*phaseMW[ip]; }
